reviews.review: Infinity War stays on target with the bigger picture. Fast-paced, witty, visually attractive, and leaves us pining for closure. Avengers Assemble!

I at first felt it would be a great movie (happy ending and all,typical stuff) let's face it marvel makes a typical ending feel like nothing you've ever seen before. Close to the ending I was waiting for something to magically change like it always does... But nothing. Then spiderman's heartbreaking part and I almost shattered. The overall ending and close ending was extremely depressing. I was constantly worried about wether they could fix this. When the screen went black in the cinema and people gave that groan against the incompletion of story I couldn't stand for a while. I was  literally stuck. It didn't feel normal. All I want is for it to be okay again. Please Marvel come up with some thing like you always do. Overall it was worth watching. The ending makes you want to watch all Marvel movies again . To cherish last moments. It was beautiful.But because of you I'll probably have increased insomnia for the next two weeks . Lol great movie y'all it was like analysing art but fun??
The best Avengers movie to date. A must see. I'm usually critical of superhero movies but this is a 10 out of 10.

great movie 
A must see to die hard fans

Creates a very similar experience to all the other Avengers' movies, but adds more dramatic effect and stunning plot twists that either fills your heart or your eyes (with tears). Or both! This ends giving you a feeling of satisfaction. But at the same time, it puts you at the edge of your seat and in anticipation for part two. Only had a few issues, but I can't say anything without spoiling the movie.
Easily the best movie i have ever seen in my young life. 10 years of build up and it exceeded my already high standards.

Although I did like the movie as a "comicbook movie", I would definitely say it's more of Thrill Ride than a movie with a beginning middle & end. It's basically a 2 Hour & 40 Minute sequence of 3rd acts. Theres great fan moments that will have audiences cheers right before shattering their heart. The movie is not a complete film as advertised. It is a set up for the next movie which did leave me a bit disappointed.

the less you know the better, just go and see this film now, take money out of your savings account, eat plain rice for dinner, sell your couch on eBay. do what you need to do to see this movie. it's capekino end of discussion.

This is the first movie of its kind honestly and man am I excited to see it again. It lives up to expectation and then some while still leaving the audience shocked every few minutes without sacrificing any of the characters.
I don't exactly describe this movie in words......its just not possible. So much character development and so many jokes. The movie surprised me and Thanos is the best villain so far!! 10/10
